issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: [UI2] new ui is not accessible with out internet connection

comments.body:
*hadoop-yarn-ui/**/web.xml*

{code}
<!DOCTYPE web-app PUBLIC
 "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Application 2.3//EN"
 "http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-app_2_3.dtd" >

<web-app>
  <display-name>YARN UI</display-name>
</web-app>
{code}

Seems we have  two solution

# Add jetty-schemas to dependancy
# Remove DOCTYPE add xmlns

cc: // [~sunil.govind@gmail.com]
[~sunilg] I remember similar issue we were faced for normal http2 server start up for RM also because of jetty server used to download from java.sun.com. I guess this was issue with dns entry?
